attributes.action: The government to look into the thousands of empty properties that are vacant
attributes.additional_details: A case needs to be open urgently housing the Homeless and people in need.
attributes.background:
More than 11,000 homes in the UK have been empty for at least a decade, research from the Liberal Democrats has found.
The data showed that 60,000 properties had been empty for two years or more, 23,000 for five years or more and more than 11,000 for ten years. The government need to look into this

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about homelessness and empty properties, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/201276

Otherwise, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
